comment: Decent. I took this class for the summer as an online course. Most of the instructions are clear, but a few were not. Dr. Pratt generally replies fast to emails. Grading system (“ungrading”) was odd for me. Average workload, but there is a lot of group work. Group conference is required, but it was hard to plan around group members' schedules.
rating_tags: Group projects--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Not a good grader she doesn't grade fairly and accuse multiple students of using AI with no proof no AI report no nothing just her intuition she ask to do word doc showing that you did the paper without AI then decided she didn't like it WOULD NOT  RECOMMEND HER AT ALL
this is the worse class i ever took while attending this university.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Amazing. Definitely take her if you can.

Dr. Pratt was easily the best professor I had this semester and if you can take one of her classes, TAKE IT. She is incredibly lenient on due dates as long as you communicate and don't abuse it and her grading system is awesome. She is super understanding and made the class really fun.
